Class FileTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.hartland.utils.trace.FileTracer

    ITracer

    public class FileTracer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an interface toward file output tracing.

      • FileTracer

        public FileTracer(java.lang.String filePath,
          boolean append)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the output target file path.
        append - true if the contents are to be appended to existing file, false to overwrite.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file is not found.
